title: Oscar yi Hou’s Paintings Lend New Frames to Queer, Asian Identity
description: The 24-year-old “internet kid” from Liverpool melds contemporary iconography with figurative works of art.
dc:creator: Ted Loos
media:credit: Vincent Tullo for The New York Times
media:description: The artist Oscar yi Hou in his studio, with a painting from his Brooklyn show, “Coolieisms, aka: Gold Mountain Cruiser (Mineshaft Trade)” (2022).
